article: Miss Jane White is English. She is in Beijing now. She has never been to  Beijing before. She wants  to go to some interesting places. Because she is _  there, she doesn't know Beijing well(know...well......). She _ some help. Look! She's  _ a policeman for help. Miss White:  Excuse me. Could you tell me how to get to the Forbidden City ? Policeman:  Sure! Go down this road, and  _ left at the second street. Then you will come to Chang'an Jie. Go along Chang'an Jie, and the Forbidden City is _ the right. You can't miss it. Miss White: Thank you a lot. Policeman: You're  _ .
